SEARCH
Package cards

Class Card

java.lang.Object
cards.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionCard, NumberCard
public abstract class Card extends Object implements Cloneable
Card class is the superclass of all cards in Duo Card Game and acts as an abstract base class for NumberCard and ActionCard classes
Since:
20/03/2025
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Gökay Gülsoy

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(String type, Color color, CardGameMediator mediator)
      constructor that initializes the the data members with provided type, color, and mediator parameters.
      Parameters:
      type - String that represents the card type
      color - Color enum value that represents color of card
      mediator - CardGameMediator object that represents the mediator of the game

    • getPoint

      public abstract int getPoint()
      If card is NumberCard point is the face value, for ActionCard's point depends on the action card type
      Returns:
      int point that is specific to card type

    • equals

      public abstract boolean equals(Object obj)
      each subclass of ActionCard class overrides this method to enforce equality semantics
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Returns:
      boolean which is true if otherObject is equals to ActionCard object, false otherwise
